doc.field: Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Photographs
Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Photographs

Prisoners: (Charles Barr, Homer Bates Chase, Morris Conway, Norman Kreisler Dorland, Fritz; unidentified man, after release, [1938], 3 different photos); (Dinner at Commodore Hotel to Welcome 14 Americans Released from Prison Camp, Oct 1938, 2 photos); (Louis Noah Ornitz, and Maurice Conway POW returning on SS Queen Mary with Charles Barr interviewed by Frankie Basch of station WMCA, Oct 18, 1938, 2 photos); (parade to honor returning prisoners, including $150,000 Banner and children's marching band, Oct 1938, 3 photos); ("Reception at pier to greet 14 released fascist prisoners arrived Queen Mary" New York, Oct 18, 1938)
